thread.title: Daniel Tosh makes joke about looking like Lane Kiffin, Tennessee responds with perfect tweet | For The Win
thread.title_full: Daniel Tosh makes joke about looking like Lane Kiffin, Tennessee responds with perfect tweet | For The Win

author: Steven Ruiz
title: Daniel Tosh makes joke about looking like Lane Kiffin, Tennessee responds with perfect tweet | For The Win
text:
Daniel Tosh makes joke about looking like Lane Kiffin, Tennessee responds with perfect tweet Daniel Tosh makes joke about looking like Lane Kiffin, Tennessee responds with perfect tweet By Steven Ruiz February 15, 2017 2:05 pm Follow @theStevenRuiz 5.7k shares By: Steven Ruiz | February 15, 2017 2:05 pm Follow @theStevenRuiz 
Comedian Daniel Tosh, host of Comedy Central’s Tosh.0, is embarking on a tour of college campuses this year . On April 21, he’ll make a stop at the University of Tennessee for a show. 
Tosh bears a striking resemblance to former Vols coach Lane Kiffin , who is not the most popular man on the Knoxville campus. So it only made sense for Tosh to request some extra security for the show. hey @utknoxville will i need extra security on the off chance people think i’m lane kiffin? #vols https://t.co/Pm1zrxlZMH 
— daniel tosh (@danieltosh) February 15, 2017 
Based on the university’s response, it’s clear the folks in Knoxville still haven’t gotten over Kiffin ditching them for the head coaching job at USC back in 2010.
